plot outline: O' Faby tells the story of the friendship between the hero and the animated character, Faby. The producer's son Rockey played the hero role. The movie is about the various troubles the hero falls in and how Faby helps him out of these situations.
title: O' Faby
plot: A man struggles with the daily issues in his life. The situation changes when he befriends Faby, who helps him in solving all the problems.

_O' Faby_ (qv) tells the story of the friendship between the hero and the animated character, Faby. The producer's son Rockey played the hero role. The movie is about the various troubles the hero falls in and how Faby helps him out of these situations.::KR
